up_down = #{upDown,jdbcType=TINYINT},
`name` = #{name,jdbcType=CHAR},

where event_id = #{eventId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

mapper.select:
select
from ev_event_talent et left join ev_event e on e.event_id = et.event_id left join ev_event_field ef on e.ef_id = ef.ef_id where et.open_id = #{openId,jdbcType=CHAR} order by e.status asc, e.start_time desc

select
from ev_event e left join ev_event_field ef on e.ef_id = ef.ef_id where ( e.event_id = #{eventId, jdbcType=BIGINT} ) and e.up_down = 1 and e.dr = 1 order by e.status asc, e.start_time desc
